title: Punch and Kick - Smart Martial Arts Striking Sound Pack
description: Punch and Kick SFX pack is a smart, modular solution for layering sound effects. Create anything from standard martial arts strikes, bone-crushing punches, to magically enhanced finishing moves.
longDescription:
The idea behind this pack is straightforward but incredibly effective. You can easily mix our 'default strike' sounds with your chosen 'layer' sounds, and they will sound great together. This works because all our 'default' and 'layer' sounds are perfectly synchronized. You don't need to adjust their timing; they naturally fit together. Feel free to get creative with different sound combinations and optionally adjust the volume of each layer to create your desired strike sound. 

We also offer a variety of swing sounds that can be helpful. We recommend triggering swings slightly before the actual strike for the best results, depending on your visuals.


Check out a few examples of what you can create: SoundCloud Preview

Files Included List

We appreciate hearing from our buyers and value your feedback! Leaving a review, providing suggestions, or reaching out to us directly helps us understand your needs and preferences better. As authors, we genuinely enjoy interacting with the developers who use our product. 


Thank you,

Cyberwave Orchestra

cyberwaveorchestra@gmail.com
technicalDetails:
Number of Audio Wavs: 103

Number of Audio Cues: 103

Sample rate/bit rate: 16bit 44.100 Wav.

Does music loop: No

Minutes of audio provided: 3 min, 11 sec

Supported Development Platforms: All


* Designed without the addition of reverb, providing you with the flexibility to easily incorporate your own when necessary! Finding an SFX pack that isn't saturated with pre-baked reverb can be as challenging as discovering a legendary item in your favorite RPG game. We consistently apply this approach across all our SFX packs, making it simpler for developers to achieve a natural and impressive audio experience that complements their visuals.
